channel.title: Data Breach & Ransomware Aggregator
channel.description: Real-time data breach notifications from state registries, federal sources, and ransomware trackers

item.title: Clarinda Regional Health Center
item.description: Healthcare organization hit by ransomware attack. Threat Actor: LockBit Location: US Source: Ransomware.live Type: Ransomware

item.title: Allen Printing Data Breach
item.description: Printing company data exposed in ransomware attack. Threat Actor: TridenLocker Source: BreachSense Type: Ransomware

item.title: Ukrainian National Pleads Guilty to Conspiracy to Use Nefilim Ransomware
item.description: A Ukrainian national pleaded guilty to conspiracy to commit computer fraud for his role in ransomware attacks against US companies. Source: DataBreaches.net Type: Data Breach

item.title: FTC Issues Proposed Order Against Illusory Systems
item.description: FTC takes action against Illusory Systems for failing to implement adequate data security measures, leading to $186 million consumer theft. Source: DataBreaches.net Type: Data Breach

item.title: Regional Medical Center
item.description: HIPAA breach notification filed with HHS OCR. Records Affected: 125,000 Location: California Source: HHS OCR Type: Healthcare Breach

item.title: Acme Healthcare Services
item.description: Data breach affecting consumer records. Records Affected: 50,000 State Records: 2,500 Maine residents Location: Portland, ME Source: Maine AG Type: State Registry

item.title: Tech Solutions Inc
item.description: Data security breach reported to Texas AG. State Records: 15,000 Texans Location: Austin, TX Source: Texas AG Type: State Registry

item.title: Healthcare Provider Reports 400K Patient Records Exposed
item.description: Major healthcare provider discloses breach affecting patient records including PHI. Source: HIPAA Journal Type: Healthcare Breach
